meanings.definition: A person who writes critical appraisals of books, movies, etc.
meanings.sent1: The reviewer gave the movie a high rating.
meanings.sent2: The reviewer's review helped me decide which book to read.
meanings.sent3: The reviewer's critique of the play was both insightful and entertaining.
meanings.sent4: She was like a reviewer of life, always analyzing and evaluating every situation.
meanings.sent5: The reviewer's words painted a vivid picture of the film in my mind.

meanings.definition: A person who examines or inspects something critically.
meanings.sent1: The reviewer carefully checked the product for any defects.
meanings.sent2: The reviewer's job is to evaluate the quality of the service provided.
meanings.sent3: The reviewer's magnifying glass made inspecting the tiny details easier.
meanings.sent4: She was a reviewer of flavors, always discerning the subtle differences in taste.
meanings.sent5: The reviewer's keen eye caught even the smallest imperfections in the design.
